values.name: Tidal Wave
values.moveMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave against {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly summons a tidal wave against {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave and {target} blocks it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave and {target} fails to block it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} summons a tidal wave and {target} fails to block it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} summons a SUPER tidal wave against {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly summons a SUPER tidal wave against {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} summons a SUPER tidal wave and {target} fails to block it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} summons a SUPER tidal wave and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} fails to create a tidal wave towards {target}.

values.name: Ice Shards
values.description: Send a flurry of ice shards.
values.moveMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards at {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly shoots a flurry of ice shards at {target}, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards and {target} blocks, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards and {target} fails to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards but {target} evades them for {-stValue} {st.ext_full}!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} shoots a flurry of ice shards and {target} fails to evade, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} shoots a MASSIVE flurry of ice shards, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly shoots a MASSIVE flurry of ice shards, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a MASSIVE flurry of ice shards and {target} fails to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a MASSIVE flurry of ice shards and {target} fails to evade, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to shoot a flurry of ice shards but fails.

values.name: Pillar Strike
values.description: Send a column of rock at your opponent.
values.moveMessage: {sender} strikes {target} with a column of rock, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly strikes {target} with a column of rock, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} sends a column of rock and {target} blocks, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} sends a column of rock and {target} fails to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} sends a column of rock but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} sends a column of rock and {target} fails to evade, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} quickly strikes {target} with a LARGE column of rock, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly strikes {target} with a LARGE column of rock, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} sends a LARGE column of rock and {target} fails to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} sends a LARGE column of rock and {target} fails to evade, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to send a column of rock but fails.

values.name: Fire Blast
values.moveMessage: {sender} blasts {target} with a meteor of flame, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly blasts {target} with a meteor of flame, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} shoots a meteor of flame and {target} blocks it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} shoots a meteor of flame and {target} fails to block it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} shoots a meteor of flame but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} shoots a meteor of flame and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} blasts {target} with a Sozin's Comet of flame, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly blasts {target} with a Sozin's Comet of flame, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a Sozin's Comet of flame and {target} fails to block it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} shoots a Sozin's Comet of flame and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to shoot a meteor of flame but fails.

values.name: Air Blast
values.moveMessage: {sender} blasts {target} back with a burst of air, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastMessage: {sender} quickly blasts {target} back with a burst of air, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockMessage: {sender} blasts a burst of air at {target} who is blocking, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailMessage: {sender} blasts a burst of air and {target} fails to block it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeMessage: {sender} blasts a burst of air but {target} evades it!
values.evadeFailMessage: {sender} blasts a burst of air and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.criticalMessage: {sender} blasts {target} back with an EXPLOSION of air, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.fastCriticalMessage: {sender} quickly blasts {target} back with an EXPLOSION of air, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.blockFailCriticalMessage: {sender} blasts an EXPLOSION of air and {target} fails to block, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.evadeFailCriticalMessage: {sender} blasts an EXPLOSION of air and {target} fails to evade it, dealing {-hpValue} damage!
values.failureMessage: {sender} tries to fire a blast of air at {target} but fails.
